document_data.name: Lezoul
document_data.mainbody: '''Lezoul''', or '''Lezoul of the Great Oaks''' was famed guide of the [[High Forest]] in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Lezoul was a guide who protected groups on pilgrimages through the [[Unicorn Run]]. He guarded these [[pilgrim]]s so that they could pay homage to [[Mielikki]]. The sorceress, [[Cortarra]], was said to obsess over his work.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], after the [[Battle of Ascore]], several retreating [[Zhentarim]] and monsters made their way through the High Forest. Lezoul's daughter, [[Siulajia]], was kidnapped and taken as a "gift" to Lord [[Geildarr Ithym]].
